Function reference

ngme2 package

ngme2
ngme2

ngme2 models

ngme()
Additive non-guassian model fitting

Latent Models

ngme_model_types()
Show ngme model types
model_ar1()
ngme ar1 model specification
model_matern()
Create a Matern SPDE model
model_rw()
ngme model - random walk of order 1

Noise types

ngme_noise_types()
show ngme noise types
noise_nig()
Specify a nig noise (normal inverse Gaussian)
noise_normal()
Specify a normal noise

Data visualization

plot(<ngme_noise>)
plot the density of noise (for stationary)
traceplot()
Trace plot of ngme fitting

Simulating of models

simulate(<ngme_model>)
Simulate latent process with noise
simulate(<ngme_noise>)
Simulate ngme noise

Auxiliary functions

f()
Specifying a latent process model (wrapper function for each model)
create_noise()
Create ngme noise with a list
mean_list()
taking mean over a list of nested lists
ngme_as_sparse()
Convert sparse matrix into sparse dgCMatrix
ngme_control()
Generate control specifications for ngme
ngme_control_f()
Generate control specifications for f function
ngme_noise()
ngme noise specification
ngme_parse_formula()
Parse the formula for ngme function
ngme_ts_make_A()
Make observation matrix for time series
print(<ngme>)
Print ngme object
print(<ngme_model>)
Print ngme model
print(<ngme_noise>)
Print ngme noise

Distributions

dig() rig() pig() qig()
The Inverse-Gaussian (IG) Distribution
dnig() rnig() pnig() qnig()
The Normal Inverse-Gaussian (GIG) Distribution
digam() rigam() pigam() qigam()
The Inverse-Gamma (IGam) Distribution
dgig() rgig() pgig() qgig()
The Generalised Inverse-Gaussian (GIG) Distribution

Datasets

argo_float
Argo float dataset
